content.html: Dear tech startups, saying money shouldn’t be the main motivation for a candidate, while raising millions in funding, is the biggest dichotomy of what’s said vs what’s being done. As long as housing, food and water cost money, money matters. I can be passionate AND want money.
content.value:
Dear tech startups, saying money shouldn’t be the main motivation for a candidate, while raising millions in funding, is the biggest dichotomy of what’s said vs what’s being done.

As long as housing, food and water cost money, money matters. 
I can be passionate AND want money.
